transcript.title: Visit by Her Royal Highness Princess Maha Chakri Sirindhorn of Thailand
transcript.content:
Her Royal Highness Princess Maha Chakri Sirindhorn ofÂ Thailand is to visit Australia for the first time fromÂ October 17- Â 29 as a guest of the Commonwealth Government.

This visit will strengthen the fiiendly and close relationsalready existing between Australia and Thailand.Â 

Whilst in Australia the Princess will observe techniquesÂ for dry land farming, irrigation and crop production whichÂ could be particularly relevant to her country.

The Princess will visit CSIRO in Canberra and Perth, theÂ Snowy Mountains Hydro-electric Authority, the MurrumbidgeeÂ Irrigation Area and Gatton Agricultural College inÂ Queensland.

She will also meet members of the Thai community in Sydney,Â Brisbane, Melbourne, Adelaide and Perth and visit Alice Springs.

In Canberra Her Royal Highness will be the guest of theÂ Governor-General and Lady Stephen.
